Reference Guide¶

Plume Base Class¶

Parent class for all types of plumes

cwipp.Plume

Parent Plume class.

Plume Base Class Methods¶

See Plume.Plume for methods and attributes.

Plume.get_I(flux2D, length, *Us)

Finds cross-wind fireline intensity parameter I

Plume.get_wf()

Finds characteristic time (Tau) and velocity (wf) scales.

Plume.classify()

Classifies the plume as penetrative (True) or boundary layer (False)
